title: Marvel Studios Fires Jonathan Majors After Guilty Verdict
description:
Actor Jonathan Majors, associated with playing Kang the Conqueror in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, has been officially found guilty. The verdict was reached by a six-person jury. Following this verdict, it has also been confirmed that Marvel has dropped the actor. As shared via THR, the “New York jury found Marvel actor Jonathan Majors guilty [...]

The post Marvel Studios Fires Jonathan Majors After Guilty Verdict appeared first on ScreenGeek.
